name: Mark Lowry
description: '''Mark Alan Lowry''' (born June 24, 1958) is an American singer, comedian, minister, and songwriter. He is best known for co-writing the song "[[Mary, Did You Know?]]" and being a member of the [[Gaither Vocal Band]] from 1988 to 2001, and 2009 to 2013, along with [[Michael English (American singer)|Michael English]], [[Guy Penrod]], [[David Phelps (musician)|David Phelps]], and [[Bill Gaither]]. Lowry has recorded 12 albums, both music and comedy.
